alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA AND SOUTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 539 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 21 miles northwest of Angola on the Lake to 8 miles north of Westfield to near Findley Lake and moving east at 25 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Evans, Westfield, Lakewood, Silver Creek, Angola, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Findley Lake, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, SUNY Fredonia, Jamestown West, Chautauqua, Portland and Sheridan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 58 and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 10. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
